name: Advanced Research in Hispanic Language & Culture
description: This course permits in-depth, 400-level study in the following courses: 82-342 Spain: Language and Culture, 82-343 Latin America: Language and Culture, and 82-344 U.S. Latinos: Language and Culture. Students will meet with the regularly scheduled 300-level class, read additional texts, and produce research assignments as agreed upon by the Instructor and student. Focus is on a deeper understanding and individualized research of the course topics. Prerequisite: By permission of the instructor only.
prereqs: By permission of the instructor only
